name: Divinestria
startIntroPart1: Hailing from Divinestria, O' wonderful leader. One of the royal noble Pureheart council.
startIntroPart2: Ilumara, lead the nationn for Divinestria.
declaringWar: It appears there are many who want you dead, and so you will be.
defeated: Fool! At least with me the underworld was under control, but soon one worse than me shall rise.
introduction: If there's money to be made, we will get it.
neutralHello: Come to me with a deal?
neutralNo: I could have you hung for that.
neutralYes: You know how to do business
hateHello: I can feel the conflict within you.
hateNo: I could have you hung for that.
hateYes: You know how to do business.
afterPeace: This is not peace, but a pause
tradeRequest: My latest batch of shipments has arrived.
uniques: Receive free [Great Scientist] when you discover [Writing]
[Great Scientist] is earned [50]% faster
[+1 Production] from every [Strategic resource]
Double quantity of [Horses] produced
Double quantity of [Iron] produced
Double quantity of [Uranium] produced
Damage is ignored when determining unit Strength <for [non-air] units>
When conquering an encampment, earn [25] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit <with [67]% chance>
[-25]% maintenance costs <for [Land] units>
+30% Strength when fighting City-State units and cities
[+1] Movement <for [Mounted] units>
Gain [90] Influence with a [Great Person] gift to a City-State
When declaring friendship, both parties gain a [10]% boost to great person generation
[+1 Faith] [in all cities] <with [1] to [2] neighboring [unimproved] [Forest] tiles>
[+2 Faith] [in all cities] <with [3] to [6] neighboring [unimproved] [Forest] tiles>
[+3 Gold, +1 Culture] from every [Land Trade Route (Food)]
[+1 Gold] from every [Land Trade Route (Production)]
[+1 Gold] from every [Land Trade Route (Gold)]
[+1 Gold] from every [Sea Trade Route (Food)]
[+1 Gold] from every [Sea Trade Route (Production)]
[+1 Gold] from every [Sea Trade Route (Gold)]
[100]% [Gold] [in capital]
Receive a free [Great Scientist] when you discover [Philosophy]
[+3 Production] from every [Strategic resource]
Receive a free [Great Prophet] when you discover [Theology]

name: Divinestria
startBias.startIntroPart1: Hailing from Divinestria, O' wonderful leader. One of the royal noble Pureheart council.
startBias.startIntroPart2: Ilumara, lead the nationn for Divinestria.
startBias.declaringWar: It appears there are many who want you dead, and so you will be.
startBias.attacked: No one attacks and lives.
startBias.defeated: Fool! At least with me the underworld was under control, but soon one worse than me shall rise.
startBias.introduction: If there's money to be made, we will get it.
startBias.neutralHello: Come to me with a deal?
startBias.neutralNo: I could have you hung for that.
startBias.neutralYes: You know how to do business
startBias.hateHello: I can feel the conflict within you.
startBias.hateNo: I could have you hung for that.
startBias.hateYes: You know how to do business.
startBias.afterPeace: This is not peace, but a pause
startBias.tradeRequest: My latest batch of shipments has arrived.
uniques: [+20]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in all cities]
[+2 Culture] [in all cities] <before discovering [Steam Power]>
Units fight as though they were at full strength even when damaged
[+1 Culture] from every [Fishing Boats]
[+2 Culture] from every [Atoll]
[-66]% maintenance costs <for [Water] units>
When defeating a [{Barbarian} {Water}] unit, earn [25] Gold and recruit it <with [50]% chance>
Earn [100]% of killed [Military] unit's [Strength] as [Culture]
Retain [50]% of the happiness from a luxury after the last copy has been traded away
[+20]% Strength <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>
[+6 Culture] from every [Landmark]
[Great Artist] is earned [25]% faster
[-50]% maintenance costs <for [Melee] units>
[Military] units gain [25]% more Experience from combat
[+1 Culture, +1 Gold] from each Trade Route
Receive free [Great Artist] when you discover [Drama and Poetry]
Receive a free [Great Prophet] when you discover [Theology]

uniques: Great General provides double combat bonus
[Great General] is earned [50]% faster
[+1] Sight <for [{Military} {Land}] units>
[-50]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in all cities]
[+2 Science] from every specialist [in all cities]
[+2 Science] from every [Great Improvement]
Receive a tech boost when scientific buildings/wonders are built in capital
All units move through Forest and Jungle Tiles in friendly territory as if they have roads. These tiles can be used to establish City Connections upon researching the Wheel.
Receive triple Gold from Barbarian encampments and pillaging Cities
Defense bonus when embarked <for [All] units>
[Land] units gain the [Amphibious] promotion
[+1 Production] from every [Pasture]
Cities are razed [2] times as fast
Starts with [Animal Husbandry]
"Borrows" city names from other civilizations in the game
May choose [1] additional belief(s) of any type when [founding] a religion
Receive a free Social Policy when you advance to the next era
[+25]% [Science] [in annexed cities]
+[100]% [Gold] [in capital]
Receive free [Great Engineer] when you discover [Engineering]
Cannot build [Settler] units
Receive a free [Great Prophet] when you discover [Theology]

uniques: [-50]% City-State Influence degradation
City-State Influence recovers at twice the normal rate
City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
[+25]% Production towards any buildings that already exist in the Capital
Enables embarkation for land units <starting from the [Ancient era]>
Enables [All] units to enter ocean tiles <starting from the [Ancient era]>
Normal vision when embarked <for [All] units>
[+10]% Strength <within [2] tiles of a [Moai]>
100 Gold for discovering a Natural Wonder (bonus enhanced to 500 Gold if first to discover it)
Double Happiness from Natural Wonders
Tile yields from Natural Wonders doubled
[+1] Movement <for [Embarked] units>
[1] Movement point cost to disembark <for [All] units>
No movement cost to pillage <for [Melee] units>
Gain a free [Harbor] [in all coastal cities]
Land units may cross [Mountain] tiles after the first [Great General] is earned
Units ending their turn on [Mountain] tiles take [50] damage
Receive a free Great Person at the end of every [Maya Long Count calendar cycle] (every 394 years), after researching [Theology]. Each bonus person can only be chosen once.
Once The Long Count activates, the year on the world screen displays as the traditional Mayan Long Count.
[-50]% Culture cost of natural border growth [in all cities]
+[15]% combat bonus for units fighting in [Friendly Land]
[+50]% [Culture] [in all cities] <during a Golden Age>
[Great Artist] is earned [50]% faster <during a Golden Age>
Receive a free [Great General] when you discover [Horseback Riding]
Receive a free [Great Prophet] when you discover [Theology]

startBias.name: Sydney
startBias.declaringWar: After thorough deliberation, Australia finds itself at a crossroads. Prepare yourself, for war is upon us.
startBias.attacked: We will mobilize every means of resistance to stop this transgression against our nation!
startBias.defeated: The principles for which we have fought will survive longer than any nation you could ever build.
uniques: Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
Will not be chosen for new games

startBias.name: Ur
startBias.declaringWar: I will enjoy hearing your last breath as you witness the destruction of your realm!
startBias.attacked: Why do we fight? Because Inanna demands it. Now, witness the power of the Sumerians!
startBias.defeated: What treachery has struck us? No, what evil?
uniques: Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
Will not be chosen for new games

startBias.name: Vancouver
startBias.declaringWar: In responding to the unstinting malignancy that has heretofore defined your relationship with Canada, we can have no recourse but war!
startBias.attacked: As we can reach no peaceful resolution with you, Canada must turn, with reluctance, to war.
startBias.defeated: I regret not defending my country to the last, although it was not of use.

startBias.name: Cahokia
startBias.declaringWar: We have wanted this for a LONG time. War it shall be.
startBias.attacked: Very well, we will kick you back to the ancient era!
startBias.defeated: This isn't how it is supposed to be!
uniques: Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
Will not be chosen for new games

startBias.name: Hanoi
startBias.declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
startBias.attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
startBias.defeated: So this is how it feels to die...

startBias.name: Almaty
startBias.declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
startBias.attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
startBias.defeated: How could we fall to the likes of you?!

startBias.name: Belgrade
startBias.declaringWar: Let's have a nice little War, shall we?
startBias.attacked: If you need your nose bloodied, we'll happily serve.
startBias.defeated: The serbian guerilla will never stop haunting you!

startBias.name: M'Banza-Kongo
startBias.declaringWar: Do you really think you can walk over us so easily? I will not let it happen. Not to Kongo - not to my people!
startBias.attacked: We are no strangers to war. You have strayed from the right path, and now we will correct it.
startBias.defeated: You are nothing but a glorified barbarian. Cruel, and ruthless.

startBias.name: Sidon
startBias.declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
startBias.attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
startBias.defeated: What a fine battle! Sidon is willing to serve you!

startBias.name: Valletta
startBias.declaringWar: We don't like your face. To arms!
startBias.attacked: You will see you have just bitten off more than you can chew.
startBias.defeated: This ship may sink, but our spirits will linger.

startBias.name: Dublin
startBias.declaringWar: War lingers in our hearts. Why carry on with a false peace?
startBias.attacked: You gormless radger! You'll dine on your own teeth before you set foot in Ireland!
startBias.defeated: A lonely wind blows through the highlands today. A dirge for Ireland. Can you hear it?

startBias.name: Edinburgh
startBias.declaringWar: You shall stain this land no longer with your vileness! To arms, my countrymen - we ride to war!
startBias.attacked: Traitorous man! The Celtic peoples will not stand for such wanton abuse and slander - I shall have your head!
startBias.defeated: Vile ruler, know that you 'won' this war in name only!

startBias.name: Jerusalem
startBias.declaringWar: By god's grace we will not allow these atrocities to occur any longer. We declare war!
startBias.attacked: May god have mercy on your evil soul.
startBias.defeated: I for one welcome our new conquer overlord!
uniques: Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
Will not be chosen for new games

startBias.declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
startBias.attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
